title: I lost a lot of IP misteriously
body:
Everytime after my games, the new Beta Launcher always told me that someone logged in my account on a different computer, I just clicked "Ok" and thought "maybe is a bug of the launcher". A day later, the same thing happened. I had 4800 IP, now I have 1000 and I didn't buy nothing. Help, please.

How do I know if someone is using my account?
Can I get back my IPs?

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Update: Someone changed my password and bought 4 champions.

Pictures: 

Password changed: https://postimg.org/image/7tns0wf6b/
I didn't bought the last 4 champions: https://postimg.org/image/kmbw0tqs3/

replies.body:
If you didn't unlock those champions then it's really important to secure your account, which can be done through the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) page.  

You should also reach out our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) form to help you out individually.  We'll reply back asap!
